welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elliniko, Greece! This charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, delicious food, and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Athens International Airport, also known as Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Athens International Airport, also known as Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
